package.name: grub-efi-image
package.build: mkdir $PKGNAME cd $PKGNAME pkgpath=`pwd ` echo '===> Building in '$pkgpath cd /usr/local/crosstools-amd64/lib/grub/x86_64-efi echo '===> Current working directory ' pwd /usr/local/crosstools-amd64/bin/grub-mkimage -Ox86_64-efi \ -d . -o ${pkgpath}/grubx64.efi -p "" part_gpt part_msdos ntfs ntfscomp \ hfsplus fat ext2 normal chain boot configfile linux multiboot iso9660 udf file ${pkgpath}/grubx64.efi cd $pkgpath
package.install: cd $PKGNAME pwd file grubx64.efi mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/grub-amd64-efi install -m 0644 --verbose grubx64.efi ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/grub-amd64-efi
